page.title: 04The Carnival
page.content: { Callington}has it's own carnival every year. With it's own{Majorettes, {floats}with{Brownies, guides}and other {societies. { { }The Carnival goes in and around some of the estates. There is a choosing of the{Carnival Queen}before the Carnival and they represent Callington at other Carnivals. Most years there has been a fair after the Carnival but sometimes the fair comes another day. The Carnival takes place in the month of July. Most of the{floats}are decorated with crepe paper and tissue etc. Also at the end of the Carnival they have the{Kit Hill Run}to Kit Hill and back.All the people wait and see who comes in first.
